attributes.action: Make set all armed forces pay at the high level and remove all tax for people serving over 7 days away from the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are requesting that the government of the United Kingdom recognise the difficulties of service away from home. To this end we request that all the UK armed forces are payed at the high payband rate, this we feel will help retention and help prevent interservice and intertrade rivalry and hostility.
We also request that tax is abolished for all members of the armed services when serving away from the UK for longer than 7 days.
